response.overview: A business dinner at the home of the enigmatic Mrs. Lieven turns into a dangerous game for Director Schallenberg. Between crystal glasses, exquisite courses, and polite conversation, an invisible struggle for power and control ensues. What begins as an invitation to dinner turns out to be a cleverly staged trap. As the evening progresses, Schallenberg feels increasingly trapped in a web of manipulation and his own dark past. An evening full of suspense, leaving the question: Who will prevail in the end?
response.title: Crème brûlée
